name: Multiverse Racer
description:
Welcome to Multiverse Racer! Choose your favorite cars and make the best chrono by riding some parallel worlds.

Graphics and programming made by me, audio and musics made by Toonguila.

Gamejam: This game was made for the 13th libgdx discord gamejam, theme was "Parallel Worlds".

Fullscreen suport : You can toggle fullscreen display with F key or via settings panel.

Gamepad support : you can configure a Gamepad (recommended) or keyboard keys. Default keyboard keys are WSAD, ZQSD or Arrows. Custom controls are saved. The game support both analog axis (recommended) and buttons for car direction control. In order to use a gamepad in your browser, you need to press any button and then configure controls in game menu.

Troubleshooting :

  • If you have trouble with web version, you can download desktop version instead.
  • Note that the game may freeze few seconds right after car selection, please don't panic and get ready for the race.
